short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of those generic, spammy Facebook comments about football? Click and watch them disappear.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We all love football (or to some, soccer), but aren't we tired of "fans" who keep commenting the same comments over and over again on Facebook? Hide those junk help you to remove those spammy comment by just one click, let you focus on Facebook comments that truly matter to you.
